design_philosophy.name: Roots
design_philosophy.tagline: Measure the foundation. Understand the growth.
design_philosophy.core_concept: The 'Roots' logo represents the intersection of nature's foundational structure and human ingenuity. It is built on the idea that to understand the whole (the tree), one must first accurately measure its foundation (the roots). The design is a fusion of the organic and the digital, symbolizing a tool that provides precise, data-driven insights into the natural world. It is designed to feel familiar, reliable, and deeply connected to the earth, yet technologically advanced.

symbolism.the_taproot: A strong, central taproot anchors the design, symbolizing the core accuracy and singular focus of the application: to provide a reliable, foundational measurement. It represents the 'single source of truth' from which all other data grows.
symbolism.branching_roots: Smaller roots branch out in a structured, almost geometric pattern. These represent the app's multifaceted capabilities, user-friendly interface, and the rich data ecosystem that supports the primary measurement. They form a subtle, underlying grid, hinting at the act of measurement and calculation.
symbolism.the_soil_line: A clean, horizontal line at the top of the roots acts as a 'ground level.' This represents the user's perspective and the tangible, real-world application of the data. It separates the unseen foundation (the complex calculations) from the visible result (the simple, accurate measurement).
symbolism.negative_space: The negative space around the roots is intentionally clean and open, suggesting the shape of a sapling or the trunk of a tree emerging above ground. This implies growth, potential, and the upward journey that begins from a strong foundation, without explicitly showing the entire tree.

primary.name: Earthy Brown
primary.description: Represents soil, stability, and the natural essence of wood. It is grounding, trustworthy, and timeless.

accent.name: Growth Green
accent.description: A vibrant, digital green that signifies life, growth, and technology. A single, small leaf rendered in this color at the tip of the taproot symbolizes the 'aha!' moment of a successful measurement and the life that springs from a solid foundation.

background.name: Transparent
background.description: Ensures the logo is versatile and integrates seamlessly across any interface, light or dark mode.

typography_and_style.style: Minimalist, geometric, and organic. The design uses clean lines and a flat aesthetic, ensuring scalability from a 16x16 favicon to a full-sized app icon. It avoids gradients and shadows to maintain a modern, iconic feel, much like the logos for Apple or Nike.
typography_and_style.inspiration: Inspired by the elegance of circuit board traces, the simple beauty of Scandinavian design, and the natural geometry of plant life.

technical_prompt_for_generation.service: AI Image Generation (e.g., Midjourney, DALL-E 3, Stable Diffusion)

prompt_details.base_prompt: A minimalist vector logo of a root system, centered on a pure white background. The style is flat, modern, and iconic. A single, strong taproot extends vertically down the center. Symmetrical, smaller roots branch out from the top of the taproot at 45-degree angles, creating a clean, geometric pattern. The entire root system is a solid, earthy brown color (#5D4037). At the very bottom tip of the central taproot, there is a single, tiny, vibrant green leaf bud (#4CAF50). The design should be enclosed within a perfect circle, using negative space to define the shape. No text, no gradients, no shadows.
prompt_details.negative_prompt: photorealistic, 3D, complex, detailed, text, letters, shadows, gradients, multiple colors, asymmetry, messy, chaotic, realistic tree, leaves, branches, soil texture
prompt_details.style_references: logo by Paul Rand, Apple logo design philosophy, Scandinavian design

element_breakdown.description: A stylized, geometric root system composed of clean lines. It should feel like a diagram or a symbol, not a realistic drawing.
The thickest line, perfectly vertical in the center of the icon.
A very small, simple leaf shape located at the absolute bottom tip of the central taproot. This is the only element with the accent color.

technical_prompt_for_generation.usage_guidelines: The final SVG should be optimized, with clean paths and no stray points. It must be legible at 16x16 pixels. The design should be provided on a transparent background.
